pageContext.description: Tip of large broad spearhead with flat diamond shaped socket. Bevelled round cutting edge.
pageContext.patina: Dull brown on smooth side - green and dark brown on the other.
pageContext.surface: Smooth on one face and corroded and broken on the other.
pageContext.associations: One of a hoard of 15 objects and a piece of sandstone, possibly belonging to a mould, 2 spearheads, 1 socketed celt, 6 rings, 2 pins with rings and 4 beads (1 large of clay, 1 of glass - yellow and purple twist, 2 of amber - a larger and a smaller - irregularly shaped).
pageContext.collection: Museum of Archaeology and Ethnology, Cambridge,No. 245, Murray Collection
